title: Draft norms issued for finance mechanism under PM Surya Ghar scheme
description: The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy has released draft norms for central financial assistance and payment security under the RESCO model and utility-led demand aggregation model for rooftop solar schemes. Consumers will pay only for the electricity generated, with ownership transferring to them after five years or through a power purchase agreement.
